mapper.select: select * from employee where user_no > 0 and retire_status = 0 order by user_no desc limit #{pageStart},${pageSize}
select count(user_no) from employee where retire_status = 0
select count(user_id) from employee where user_id=#{user_id}
select user_no from employee where user_id=#{user_id}
select work_status from empAttendance where user_no=#{user_no} and attend_date=DATE(now()) and commute_time is not null
mapper.update: update empAttendance set work_status='퇴근',quitting_time=now() where user_no=#{user_no} and attend_date=DATE(now())
update employee_auth set auth=#{auth} where user_id = #{user_id}
update employee set retire_status=1, retire_date=now() where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select empAttend_no, attend_date, commute_time, quitting_time, work_status, check_status, vacation_status, vacation_start, vacation_end from empAttendance where user_no = #{user_no} and (vacation_approval = '승인' or commute_time is not null) AND ( attend_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND attend_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01')) ORDER BY CASE WHEN vacation_status IS NULL THEN attend_date ELSE vacation_start END

select count(check_status) from empAttendance where check_status = '지각' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( attend_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND attend_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01'))

select SUM(DATEDIFF( LEAST(vacation_end, LAST_DAY(CURDATE())), GREATEST(vacation_start, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')) )) AS total_vacation_days from empAttendance where (vacation_status = '휴가' or vacation_status = '기타') and vacation_approval = '승인' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( vacation_start < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND vacation_end >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'))

select count(*) from empAttendance where (vacation_status = '오전반차' or vacation_status = '오후반차') and vacation_approval = '승인' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( vacation_start < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') AND vacation_end >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01'))

select SUM(DATEDIFF( LEAST(vacation_end, LAST_DAY(CURDATE())), GREATEST(vacation_start, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')) )) AS total_vacation_days from empAttendance where (vacation_status = '휴가' or vacation_status = '기타') and vacation_approval = '승인' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( vacation_start <= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-12-31') AND vacation_end >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01'))

select count(*) from empAttendance where (vacation_status = '오전반차' or vacation_status = '오후반차') and vacation_approval = '승인' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( vacation_start <= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-12-31') AND vacation_end >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01'))

select count(*) from empAttendance where user_no = #{user_no} and work_status is not null and ( attend_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND attend_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01'))

select SUM(DATEDIFF( LEAST(vacation_end, LAST_DAY(CURDATE())), GREATEST(vacation_start, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01')) )) AS total_vacation_days from empAttendance where (vacation_status ='휴가' or vacation_status='기타') and vacation_approval !='반려' and user_no = #{user_no} AND ( vacation_start <= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-12-31') AND vacation_end >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-01-01'))
